zh-cn: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林
约瑟夫·维萨里奥尼斯泽·朱加什维利

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家、革命家、苏联最高领导人。
description.en: Soviet politician, revolutionary, and paramount leader of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·斯大林的父亲。
description.en: Father of Joseph Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·斯大林的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Joseph Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·斯大林的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of Joseph Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·斯大林的第二任妻子。
description.en: Second wife of Joseph Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·斯大林的长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Joseph Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·斯大林的次子。
description.en: Second son of Joseph Stalin.

nodes.id: 斯韦特兰娜·阿利卢耶娃

zh-cn: 斯韦特兰娜·阿利卢耶娃

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·斯大林的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Joseph Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 苏联的缔造者。
description.en: Founder of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 苏联革命家，斯大林的主要政治对手。
description.en: Soviet revolutionary and a major political rival of Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 老布尔什维克，曾与斯大林结盟，后被清洗。
description.en: Old Bolshevik, once allied with Stalin, later purged.

description.zh-cn: 老布尔什维克，曾与斯大林结盟，后被清洗。
description.en: Old Bolshevik, once allied with Stalin, later purged.

description.zh-cn: 老布尔什维克，曾与斯大林结盟，后被清洗。
description.en: Old Bolshevik, once allied with Stalin, later purged.

description.zh-cn: 苏联秘密警察头子，被怀疑谋杀了斯大林。
description.en: Head of the Soviet secret police, suspected of murdering Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林的继任者，发起了去斯大林化运动。
description.en: Successor to Stalin, initiated de-Stalinization.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国元首。
description.en: Führer of Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的缔造者。
description.en: Founder of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的缔造者。
description.en: Founder of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫领导人，与斯大林关系恶化。
description.en: Leader of Yugoslavia, had a fallout with Stalin.

zh-cn: 俄国社会民主工党 (布尔什维克)
en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 一个位于欧亚大陆北部的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in Northern Eurasia.

description.zh-cn: 苏联30年代的一场大规模政治镇压运动。
description.en: A campaign of political repression in the Soviet Union which occurred from 1936 to 1938.

description.zh-cn: 苏联推行的一项将个体农户合并为集体农庄的政策。
description.en: A policy pursued in the Soviet Union to consolidate individual landholdings and labour into collective farms.

description.zh-cn: 苏联在农业集体化期间发生的大规模饥荒。
description.en: A major famine that killed millions of people in the major grain-producing areas of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突。
description.en: A global war.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中苏联与纳粹德国及其盟国之间的战争。
description.en: The conflict between the Soviet Union and Nazi Germany and its allies during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国之间的战争。
description.en: A war between North Korea and South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 二战后以美国为首的西方集团与以苏联为首的东方集团之间的地缘政治紧张时期。
description.en: A period of geopolitical tension between the Western Bloc (led by the United States) and the Eastern Bloc (led by the Soviet Union) after World War II.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国与苏联签订的互不侵犯条约。
description.en: A non-aggression pact between Nazi Germany and the Soviet Union.

zh-cn: 列宁最后的遗嘱——给代表大会的信

description.zh-cn: 列宁口授的一系列文件，其中批评了包括斯大林在内的布尔什维克领导人。
description.en: A series of documents dictated by Lenin, which criticized Bolshevik leaders, including Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 苏联在斯大林去世后清除其个人崇拜及政治体制影响的一系列改革。
description.en: The process of political reform in the Soviet Union that took place after the death of Joseph Stalin.

nodes.id: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

zh-cn: 关于个人崇拜及其后果
en: On the Cult of Personality and Its Consequences

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上发表的报告，批判了斯大林。
description.en: A speech delivered by Khrushchev at the 20th Congress of the CPSU, which criticized Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 希特勒统治下的德国。
description.en: Germany under the rule of Adolf Hitler.

nodes.id: 苏联共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 苏联共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The top leadership position of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

en: Council of Ministers of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest executive and administrative body of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 苏联在苏德战争期间的最高权力机关。
description.en: The supreme authority in the Soviet Union during the German-Soviet War.

description.zh-cn: 苏联的武装力量。
description.en: The army and air force of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 冷战时期以苏联为首的中东欧社会主义国家集团。
description.en: The group of socialist states of Central and Eastern Europe, led by the Soviet Union during the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 一个位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

nodes.id: 中苏友好同盟互助条约

zh-cn: 中苏友好同盟互助条约

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与苏联签订的同盟条约。
description.en: A treaty of alliance concluded between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 维萨里奥·朱加什维利是约瑟夫·斯大林的父亲。
叶卡捷琳娜·格拉泽是约瑟夫·斯大林的母亲。

relationships.source: 斯韦特兰娜·阿利卢耶娃
斯韦特兰娜·阿利卢耶娃

relationships.target: 苏联共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 斯大林在列宁去世后与托洛茨基展开权力斗争，最终将托洛茨基驱逐并派人将其暗杀。
description.en: After Lenin's death, Stalin engaged in a power struggle with Trotsky, eventually exiling and assassinating him.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林在与托洛茨基的斗争中曾与加米涅夫结盟，后将其作为“新反对派”清除。
description.en: Stalin allied with Kamenev against Trotsky, but later eliminated him as part of the 'New Opposition'.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林在与托洛茨基的斗争中曾与季诺维也夫结盟，后将其作为“新反对派”清除。
description.en: Stalin allied with Zinoviev against Trotsky, but later eliminated him as part of the 'New Opposition'.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林在清除“左派”后，将支持新经济政策的布哈林作为右倾投降主义集团清除。
description.en: After eliminating the 'Left Opposition', Stalin purged Bukharin, who supported the NEP, as a 'Right Deviation'.

description.zh-cn: 列宁在遗嘱中建议将斯大林从总书记的职位上调开，称其“太粗暴”。
description.en: In his testament, Lenin recommended removing Stalin from the post of General Secretary, calling him 'too rude'.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林强制推行农业集体化政策以解决粮食短缺问题并消灭富农阶级。
description.en: Stalin forced the policy of agricultural collectivization to solve grain shortages and eliminate the kulak class.

description.zh-cn: 强制集体化和过高的粮食征购导致了大规模饥荒。
description.en: Forced collectivization and excessive grain procurement led to a massive famine.

description.zh-cn: 以基洛夫被刺杀为契机，斯大林发动了对党、政、军的大规模清洗。
description.en: Using the assassination of Kirov as a pretext, Stalin launched a large-scale purge of the party, government, and military.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基及其支持者是斯大林大清洗的主要目标之一。
description.en: Trotsky and his supporters were one of the main targets of Stalin's Great Purge.

description.zh-cn: 签订《苏德互不侵犯条约》，形成暂时性合作关系。
description.en: Signed the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact, forming a temporary cooperative relationship.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国入侵苏联后，双方成为战争中的主要对手。
description.en: After Nazi Germany invaded the Soviet Union, the two became major adversaries in the war.

description.zh-cn: 该条约使德国得以入侵波兰而无后顾之忧，从而引发了第二次世界大战。
description.en: The pact allowed Germany to invade Poland without fear of a two-front war, triggering World War II.

description.zh-cn: 二战后，斯大林在东欧扶植社会主义阵营，形成了东方集团。
description.en: After WWII, Stalin fostered a socialist bloc in Eastern Europe, forming the Eastern Bloc.

description.zh-cn: 作为东方集团的领导人，斯大林与西方国家展开对峙，形成冷战格局。
description.en: As the leader of the Eastern Bloc, Stalin engaged in a standoff with Western countries, leading to the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 因政治分歧，斯大林与铁托关系恶化，导致苏南交恶。
description.en: Due to political disagreements, the relationship between Stalin and Tito deteriorated, leading to the Tito-Stalin split.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，斯大林领导的苏联与中国结盟。
description.en: After the founding of the PRC, the Soviet Union under Stalin's leadership allied with China.

relationships.source: 中苏友好同盟互助条约

description.zh-cn: 该条约正式确立了中苏之间的同盟关系。
description.en: This treaty formally established the alliance between China and the Soviet Union.

relationships.source: 中苏友好同盟互助条约

description.zh-cn: 该条约正式确立了中苏之间的同盟关系。
description.en: This treaty formally established the alliance between China and the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林同意了金日成以军事方式统一朝鲜半岛的设想，并提供了军事装备。
description.en: Stalin agreed to Kim Il-sung's plan to unify the Korean peninsula by military means and provided military equipment.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上发表秘密报告，全面批判斯大林，掀起去斯大林化运动。
description.en: Khrushchev delivered a secret speech at the 20th Congress of the CPSU, criticizing Stalin and launching the de-Stalinization campaign.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 这份报告是去斯大林化运动的开端。
description.en: This speech marked the beginning of the de-Stalinization campaign.

description.zh-cn: 该运动旨在清除斯大林的个人崇拜和政治影响。
description.en: The campaign aimed to dismantle Stalin's cult of personality and political influence.

description.zh-cn: 被怀疑在斯大林中风后故意延误治疗，甚至下毒谋杀斯大林。
description.en: Suspected of intentionally delaying medical treatment or even poisoning Stalin after his stroke.
